userStory.storyName: Issuing and storing attestations in the EUDI Wallet via QR code
userStory.displayName: Issuing and storing attestations in the EUDI Wallet via QR code
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to issue and store attestations in my EUDI Wallet advertised by issuers
  So that I can prove to the Relying Parties that I own them when I am requested using my EUDI Wallet
